overview: Ken Pearlman’s 30 years of experience includes research and investments in materials, chemicals, electronics and technology industries. Prior to co-founding Oceanshore, he managed private equity investment activities for Firsthand Capital, where he focused on early stage deals in semiconductors and clean technology. Before that, Ken was with CIBC World Markets, where he was Executive Director of Semiconductor Research. While at CIBC, he achieved the distinction of becoming one of the Wall Street Journal’s All-Star Analysts in 1999 and 2000.
